data.text: RT @omadnp: #DeltaAirlines - gate agent at #bna refused to enforce mask mandate in airport! Come on delta - you should be better than that!

Very interesting choice of words from pilot from @Delta airlines pilot from BOS to DTW: “thank you for using your CHOICE of wearing a mask on our flight.” Isn’t it law to wear a mask???? I’d like a response from #DeltaAirlines.
#DeltaAirlines - gate agent at #bna refused to enforce mask mandate in airport! Come on delta - you should be better than that!
He had a trump 2024 mask and full trump 2024 gear. He was a nice guy and wasn’t hostile or anything yet #deltaairlines liberal flight attendant had him removed #Delta I hope he sues
